name: Tricky Treats (WazaXESoftware)
description:
48-hour game jam at Ages Skövde University. 

In this game, you play as Berry the bag, and he needs some Yummy Candy!

You Must play with an Xbox  Controller!

Left Stick: Movement.

Right Stick: Camera Rotation.

Programmer: Morgan Sponton

Grafik: Kristoffer French-Skog

Design: Fredrik Rahmberg
